title: 魔改不识别
author: 苍穹空
txt_content:
本帖最后由 苍穹空 于 2020-5-7 11:33 编辑 

（分类应该是对的吧……）
版本1.7.10
用的MineTweaker3-1.7.10-3.0.10B
MineTweakerRecipeMaker-1.7.10-1.1.1
ModTweaker2-0.9.6
魔改的是通用机械的创造立方和创造储罐

创造储罐
 mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped(<ThermalExpansion:Tank>,[[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:8>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:8>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:8>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<TConstruct:GlassBlock>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<TConstruct:GlassBlock>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<TConstruct:GlassBlock>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({tier: "Creative", electricity: 1.7976931348623157E308}),<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<TConstruct:GlassBlock>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<TConstruct:GlassBlock>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<ThermalExpansion:Tank:4>,<TConstruct:GlassBlock>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Glass:1>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:9>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null],
[null,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:8>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:8>,<ThermalExpansion:Frame:8>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,null]]);



创造立方

mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped(<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({owner: "……", security: 0, tier: "Creative", electricity: 1.7976931348623157E308, Items: []}),[[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Mekanism:EnergyTablet>.withTag({electricity: 1000000.0}),<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<universalsingularities:universal.vanilla.singularity:2>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Mekanism:EnergyTablet>.withTag({electricity: 1000000.0}),<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:1>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:1>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:AtomicAlloy>,<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({tier: "Ultimate", electricity: 1.28E8}),<Mekanism:AtomicAlloy>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<universalsingularities:universal.vanilla.singularity:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({tier: "Ultimate", electricity: 1.28E8}),<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:3>,<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({tier: "Ultimate", electricity: 1.28E8}),<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<universalsingularities:universal.vanilla.singularity:2>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:AtomicAlloy>,<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({tier: "Ultimate", electricity: 1.28E8}),<Mekanism:AtomicAlloy>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:1>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:2>,<Mekanism:ControlCircuit:1>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Mekanism:EnergyTablet>.withTag({electricity: 1000000.0}),<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<universalsingularities:universal.vanilla.singularity:2>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<ExtraUtilities:decorativeBlock1:5>,<Mekanism:EnergyTablet>.withTag({electricity: 1000000.0}),<Avaritia:Resource:6>],
[<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>,<Avaritia:Resource:6>]]);



对于创造立方，有的时候有合成表但是合出来的要么是没能量的，要么是基础能量立方
在游戏内尝试用/mtrm 把没电的合成有电的但是没得用


所有id都是用/mt hand获得的

有一次创造储罐能合成了但是立方不行，我又改了下立方结果就都出错了
（上面都是第一次魔改时的）

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
你这立方和储罐是带容量nbt的，而/mt hand出来的没有，当然会出错。
我也不会

replies.author: 苍穹空
replies.txt_content:
DE_SHARK 发表于 2020-5-7 11:38
你这立方和储罐是带容量nbt的，而/mt hand出来的没有，当然会出错。
我也不会 ...
/mt hand出来的是这个……
<Mekanism:EnergyCube>.withTag({owner: "……", security: 0, tier: "Creative", electricity: 1.7976931348623157E308, Items: []})
用/mtrm的话是<Mekanism:EnergyCube>
……

replies.author: 明日的星
replies.txt_content: 1.7.10魔改不支持nbt的内容，withTag中的数据是读不出来的

replies.author: 苍穹空
replies.txt_content:
该想法已被淘汰……
实现不了
